ovdesc.p: Capture the details of Safe deposit box

desc.p: This field to provide description for the table
This field is used to mention Cabinet number
This field is drop down field with EB.LOOKUP values
The user can select the Safe deposit box based on
the customer requirement. The Box type selected here
should be available as a product under the Safe Deposit Box product group
This field is used to specifiy the Start number
This field is used to capture the number of boxes
being created in the cabinet for the
